mapper.select:
select
from recruit_detail where del_flg = 0 LIMIT #{param1} OFFSET #{param2};

-- select s.name as shop_name, select rd.id, rd.recruit_id, rd.title1,rd.company_name, rd.recruit_name, rd.salary, rd.address, rd.station, r.publish_start, r.publish_end from recruit_detail as rd inner join recruit as r on r.id = rd.recruit_id -- left join shop as s on s.id = rd.shop_id where rd.del_flg = 0
and rd.company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and rd.title1 like '%${title}%'
and rd.recruit_name like '%${recruitName}%'
and rd.salary like '%${salary}%'
and rd.address like '%${address}%'
and rd.station like '%${station}%'
and date_format(r.publish_start,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{publishStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(r.publish_end,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{publishEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by ${orderStatement} LIMIT #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select count(rd.id) as totalCount from recruit_detail as rd inner join recruit as r on r.id = rd.recruit_id -- left join shop as s on s.id = rd.shop_id where rd.del_flg = 0
and rd.company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and rd.title1 like '%${title}%'
and rd.recruit_name like '%${recruitName}%'
and rd.salary like '%${salary}%'
and rd.address like '%${address}%'
and rd.station like '%${station}%'
and date_format(r.publish_start,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{publishStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(r.publish_end,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{publishEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update recruit_detail set video_url1 = "" where recruit_id = #{recruitId}
